## getNextJsHeaders variable

Get Next.js headers array from object containing header values by name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getNextJsHeaders: ({ headers, }: {
    headers: {
        [headerName: string]: string;
    };
}) => {
    key: string;
    value: string;
}[]
```
